location.folderPath: Load Excel Sheet data to SQL Tables
Load Excel Sheet data to SQL Tables

activities.name: Copy data 1 to load date from adls to sql
Delete Src Files After loading to SQL and archieving

dependsOn.activity: Copy data 1 to load date from adls to sql

activities.name: Get Metadata 2 to get FileName and each File Size
If Condition to check Larger Files

dependsOn.activity: Get Metadata 2 to get FileName and each File Size

expression.value: @greater(activity('Get Metadata 2 to get FileName and each File Size').output.size, 1048576)

DelFile.value: @activity('Get Metadata 2 to get FileName and each File Size').output.itemName

activities.name: Get Metadata_2 for to get files name and last modified
If Condition to check data modified files

dependsOn.activity: Get Metadata_2 for to get files name and last modified

expression.value: @less(activity('Get Metadata_2 for to get files name and last modified').output.lastModified,formatDateTime(adddays(utcNow(), -1), 'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ'))

delFile.value: @activity('Get Metadata_2 for to get files name and last modified').output.itemName
